input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item keywords and item name information.

Item name:
Traditions by Waverly 14979056X036CHR Strands 56-Inch by 36-Inch Tier and Valance Set, Charcoal

Item keywords:
67% Poly/33% Cotton/Unlined
Imported
Includes two Tier panels and one valance
Each Tier measures 26W x 36L; valance measures 52W x 14L
1.5Rod pockets accommodate up to a 1Rod
67percent poly/33percent Cotton, unlined
for the kitchen, breakfast room, or bathroom. 
Machine washable cold, tumble dry on low.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Bring any small window to life with the Traditions by Waverly (14979056X036CHR ) Strands 56-Inch by 36-Inch charcoal tier and valance set. Offering both style and function, this imported set Includes two tier panels and one valance and brings in beautiful light, while still providing the privacy and window coverage you need. Perfect for the kitchen, breakfast room, or bathroom. 1.5Rod pockets accommodate up to a 1Rod. Keep tiers Closed for maximum privacy, or separate slightly for more light and decorative flair! Valance measures 52W x 14L. Each Tier measures 26W by 36L. 67% poly/33% cotton, unlined . Machine wash cold, tumble dry on low.
input_text.Response B: Strands tiers and valance by Waverly add a contemporary look to your decor. The solid design coordinates easily with your existing decor. The set includes two tiers and one valance that measure 26 inches wide by 36 inches long, plus a 52-inch wide by 14-inch long valance. Each tier has a 1.5-inch rod pocket, accommodating up to a 1-inch rod. These charming window accents are made from a blend of 67-percent polyester and 33-percent cotton.

label_annotations.factors_a: Response A seems a little harder to read and appears to have some grammatical errors when interpreting some of the information.
